title: Dynasty Tactics [NTSC]
description:
PS2 iso of Dynasty Tactics. It's an interesting game to say the least. Enjoy!



-Sershadak



Dynasty Tactics is a strategy game for the Sony PlayStation 2. The title is set 

during the Three Kingdoms era and takes place after the Yellow Turban Rebellion and 

Dong Zhuo's death. The gameplay uses elements from Koei's in depth turn based system 

in the Romance of the Three Kingdoms series. While the Dynasty Warriors series is a 

contemporary interpretation of the setting, the mood in Dynasty Tactics is archaic 

and gritty, closer to the tone set in the novel. The players can choose to roughly 

follow events from the epic or dramatically diverge from it.


^Straight from wikipedia :P
